amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to express the Sense of Congress regarding the impact of the high cost of prescription drugs on communities of color and persons living in rural or sparsely populated areas of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to express the Sense of Congress regarding the impact of the high cost of prescription drugs on communities of color and persons living in rural or sparsely populated areas of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Kennedy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
